sentence.text: Suggestive evidence of association was found for the D-serine plasma-CSF ratio at the D-amino-acid oxidase (DAO) gene (b=-0.28; P=9.08 x 10(-8)), whereas a variant in L-serine metabolic process (that encodes serine racemase and is associated with schizophrenia) constituted the most strongly associated locus for the L-serine to D-serine ratio in CSF.
